Specimen Type: Various anaerobically collected specimens (deep wound exudate, abscess contents, tissue biopsies, body fluids, blood culture, other sterile sites)
Purpose: To isolate and identify pathogenic anaerobic bacteria in clinical specimens and generate accurate culture results.
Equipment: Anaerobic incubation jar or chamber with GasPak system, incubator (35–37 °C), anaerobic culture media, Gram stain reagents, biochemical identification system (e.g., API 20A)
